com.mindfusion.scheduling.model

Class Recurrence

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindfusion.scheduling.model.Recurrence
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Recurrence
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Defines recurrence patterns for items scheduled to repeat over and over again.

    • Constructor Summary

      Initializes a new instance of the Recurrence class.

      • samePatternAs

        public boolean samePatternAs(Recurrence recurrence)
        Description copied from class: Recurrence
        Determines whether two Recurrence objects define the same recurrence pattern.
        Parameters:
        recurrence - A Recurrence object to compare with this recurrence.
        Returns:
        true if the Recurrence instances represent the same recurrence patterns; otherwise false.

      • applyPattern

        public void applyPattern(Recurrence recurrence)
        Description copied from class: Recurrence
        Copies the fields of the specified Recurrence object to this recurrence.

        This method behaves similarly to the Recurrence.clone() method except that it does not create a new object.

        Parameters:
        recurrence - The Recurrence object whose fields to copy.

      • getEffectiveEndDate

        public DateTime getEffectiveEndDate()
        Description copied from class: Recurrence
        Returns the effective end date for this recurrence.

        The end date is calculated from the specified repeat number if RecurrenceEnd is set to NumOccurrences.

        Returns:
        The end date of the recurrence if the recurrence is set to expire or DateTime.MaxValue otherwise.

      • saveTo

        public void saveTo(org.w3c.dom.Element element,
                   XmlSerializationContext context)
        Description copied from class: Recurrence
        Saves the recurrence data to an XML document.

        The recurrence properties are saved as elements of an XML document, and can be later restored using the Recurrence.loadFrom(org.w3c.dom.Element, com.mindfusion.scheduling.model.XmlSerializationContext) method.

        Parameters:
        element - Allows adding data to the XML document.
        context - The context object contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.

      • loadFrom

        public void loadFrom(org.w3c.dom.Element element,
                     XmlSerializationContext context)
        Description copied from class: Recurrence
        Loads the recurrence data from an XML document.

        Loads the state of a recurrence from an XML document, where it was previously saved via Recurrence.saveTo(org.w3c.dom.Element, com.mindfusion.scheduling.model.XmlSerializationContext).

        Parameters:
        element - Allows reading data from the XML document.
        context - The context object contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.

      • onValidateOccurrence

        protected void onValidateOccurrence(ValidateOccurrenceEvent e)
        Description copied from class: Recurrence
        Raises the validateOccurrence event.
        Parameters:
        e - An object, containing the event data.

      • getOccurrence

        public Item getOccurrence(int index)
        Description copied from class: Recurrence
        Returns the occurrence having the specified index.

        This function might take considerable amount of time if you specify a large index in an infinite recurrence.

        Parameters:
        index - The index of the occurrence to retrieve.
        Returns:
        A reference to the occurrence with the specified index or null, if there is no such occurrence.

      • getOccurrence

        public Item getOccurrence(int index,
                          ByRef<java.lang.Boolean> isDeleted)
        Description copied from class: Recurrence
        Returns the occurrence having the specified index.

        This function might take considerable amount of time if you specify a large index in an infinite recurrence.

        Parameters:
        index - The index of the occurrence to retrieve.
        isDeleted - If the specified occurrence is an exception, this parameter contains upon function completion whether the exception is deleted or not.
        Returns:
        A reference to the occurrence with the specified index or null, if there is no such occurrence.

      • getOccurrence

        public Item getOccurrence(int index,
                          ByRef<java.lang.Boolean> isDeleted,
                          boolean noException)
        Description copied from class: Recurrence
        Returns the occurrence having the specified index.

        This function might take considerable amount of time if you specify a large index in an infinite recurrence.

        Parameters:
        index - The index of the occurrence to retrieve.
        isDeleted - If the specified occurrence is an exception, this parameter contains upon function completion whether the exception is deleted or not.
        noException - Specifies whether to return the original item, in case this occurrence is an exception.
        Returns:
        A reference to the occurrence with the specified index or null, if there is no such occurrence.

      • generateItems

        public ItemList generateItems(DateTime startDate,
                              DateTime endDate)
        Description copied from class: Recurrence
        Creates occurrence items for this recurrence in the specified date range.
        Parameters:
        startDate - The range start date.
        endDate - The range end date.
        Returns:
        A list of Item instances representing each occurrence of the recurrent event in the specified date range.

      • clearExceptions

        public void clearExceptions()
        Description copied from class: Recurrence

      • markException

        public void markException(Item item,
                          boolean deleted)
        Description copied from class: Recurrence
        Marks the specified item as an exception of a recurrence pattern.
        Parameters:
        item - The Item instance to be marked as an exception.
        deleted - Specifies whether the exception is created by deleting one occurrence from the recurrent pattern or by changing the properties of the occurrence.

      • getDays

        public int getDays()
        Description copied from class: Recurrence
        Gets how many days should pass before the event occurs again.

        This value is used when the recurrence Recurrence.getPattern() is Daily.

        Returns:
        An integer value specifying the number of days between event occurrences. The minimal allowed value is 1.

      • setDays

        public void setDays(int value)
        Description copied from class: Recurrence
        Sets how many days should pass before the event occurs again.

        This value is used when the recurrence Recurrence.getPattern() is Daily.

        Parameters:
        value - An integer value specifying the number of days between event occurrences. The minimal allowed value is 1.

      • getDayOfMonth

        public int getDayOfMonth()
        Description copied from class: Recurrence
        Gets on which day of a month the event occurs.

        This value is used when the recurrence Recurrence.getPattern() is Monthly or Yearly.

        Returns:
        An integer value specifying at which day of the month the recurring event occurs. The allowed values range from 1 to 31.

      • setDayOfMonth

        public void setDayOfMonth(int value)

        public Occurrence getOccurrence()
        Description copied from class: Recurrence
        Gets on which occurrence of the day type specified in Recurrence.getDay() the event occurs.

        This value is used when the recurrence Recurrence.getPattern() is Monthly or Yearly and Recurrence.getMonthlyRecurrence() or Recurrence.getYearlyRecurrence() are ByDayType.

        Returns:
        One of the Occurrence constants.

        This value is used when the recurrence Recurrence.getPattern() is ByTimeInterval.

      • setInterval

        This value is used when the recurrence Recurrence.getPattern() is ByTimeInterval.

        Parameters:
        value - A Duration value indicating the time interval between recurring items.

      • getStartDate

        public DateTime getStartDate()
        Description copied from class: Recurrence
        Gets when the recurring event should occur for the first time.

        The time properties set in a recurrence object override the time properties of a schedule item to which the recurrence is assigned. The Calendar component displays "occurrence" items corresponding to the recurring master item. The first occurrence is displayed in the date cell specified in this property.

        Returns:
        A DateTime object specifying the recurrence start date.

      • setStartDate

        public void setStartDate(DateTime value)
        Description copied from class: Recurrence
        Sets when the recurring event should occur for the first time.

        The time properties set in a recurrence object override the time properties of a schedule item to which the recurrence is assigned. The Calendar component displays "occurrence" items corresponding to the recurring master item. The first occurrence is displayed in the date cell specified in this property.

        Parameters:
        value - A DateTime object specifying the recurrence start date.

        public RecurrenceEnd getRecurrenceEnd()
        Description copied from class: Recurrence

        public int getNumOccurrences()

      • getEndDate

        public DateTime getEndDate()
        Description copied from class: Recurrence
        Gets the end date of the recurrence.

        This value is considered by the recurrence only if Recurrence.getRecurrenceEnd() is EndDate.

        Returns:
        A DateTime object specifying the end date of the recurring event.

      • setEndDate

        public void setEndDate(DateTime value)
        Description copied from class: Recurrence
        Sets the end date of the recurrence.

        This value is considered by the recurrence only if Recurrence.getRecurrenceEnd() is EndDate.

        Parameters:
        value - A DateTime object specifying the end date of the recurring event.

      • getExceptions

        public java.util.Collection<RecurrenceException> getExceptions()
        Description copied from class: Recurrence
        Gets the list of all recurrence exceptions.
        Returns:
        A collection containing all exceptions defined for this recurrence.

      • getMaster

        public Item getMaster()
        Description copied from class: Recurrence
        Gets the master item of this recurrence. The property returns null if the recurrence is not associated with an item.

        To associate a recurrence with an item, pass a reference to a Recurrence object to the item's Item.setRecurrence(com.mindfusion.scheduling.model.Recurrence) method.

        Returns:
        A reference to the schedule item whose recurrence is defined by this object.

        listener - The listener to be removed.
